rows.label: bf08080100_0010
rows.name:
I see...
So you lost track of Tora and the others?

rows.label: bf08080100_0020
rows.name:
Don't worry!
Masterpon is tougher than he looks!

rows.label: bf08080100_0030
rows.name:
It's faint, but I can feel the energy signature of 
Meleph-sama's weapons. She must be here too...

rows.label: bf08080100_0040
rows.name: Right. Let's rest a bit, then go find them.

rows.label: bf08080100_0050
rows.name: Rex, what about that man over there?

rows.label: bf08080100_0060
rows.name:
Yeah...
He got pretty badly hurt fighting me.

rows.label: bf08080100_0070
rows.name: I couldn't just leave him there.

rows.label: bf08080100_0080
rows.name: I figured as much.

rows.label: bf08080100_0090
rows.name: That's so typical of you.

rows.label: bf08080100_0100
rows.name: So what's the plan now?

rows.label: bf08080100_0110
rows.name: Uh...

rows.label: bf08080100_0120
rows.name: Hikari, with your powers now, maybe you could...

rows.label: bf08080100_0130
rows.name:
...I guess it can't be helped.

Gimme a sec...

rows.label: bf08080100_0140
rows.name:
Wow!
You can do that now?

rows.label: bf08080100_0150
rows.name: This is the power of the Master Blade.

rows.label: bf08080100_0160
rows.name: The Master Blade contains data from all Blade cores.

rows.label: bf08080100_0170
rows.name: [ML:undisp ][ML:Dash ]！！

rows.label: bf08080100_0180
rows.name: What in the...?

rows.label: bf08080100_0190
rows.name: What's wrong?

rows.label: bf08080100_0200
rows.name: His heart... it's human...

rows.label: bf08080100_0210
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]Uh?

rows.label: bf08080100_0220
rows.name: He's...

rows.label: bf08080100_0230
rows.name: ...a Man-Eater!
